website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive kit of supplies for older students preparing to study.
pros: Although aimed at high school and college ages, the supplies could be used by any teacher for any grade level
Kit includes notebooks, colored pencils, highlighters, pencils, erasers, and more
cons: Crayons and magic markers are not included in this set

customer_reviews.title: IT had everything I needed :)
customer_reviews.text: I simply loved the bundle it was much cheaper then buying everything at once and had most of what I needed for trade school!!!!!!!!!! Not only that but the quality of the supplies was phenomenal I will definitely be buying from them again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Mapes

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome back-to-school bundle! It really has a lot for the money, and what a timesaver! There are even items included in the box that are not in the description. One of these will get a HS student through one academic year, or a college student through one semester. Really happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Christopher M. Minio

customer_reviews.title: Good mix of school supplies
customer_reviews.text: I needed a range of supplies but did not want to look for each individual item. This box contained most of what has been needed by my high school student so far this year. I am very pleased with the purchase and with the selection of items.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Everything that the kids needed from one place. Didn't have to go through the hassle of going to an actual store. I would definitely recommended and buy from here again. The binders need to be 2 inch rather than 1. The folders have no holes to put in the folders.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: This would have been more appreciated if you all gave us the options for a girl box or boy box. I received a box with bright neon colors and my son wasn’t happy about that, so I ended up spending more money getting him what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: MeLinda

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: I did not see this package. I got 2 , one for each of my granddaughters. They seemd happy and pleased to get it. That is all I can tell you.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amount of products
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amount of back to school products for my son starting the 10th grade! He loves everything that came in the box!! High quality products!! Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had absolutely everything my son needed for 9th grade! Saved me from the "1st Day after school circus to get school supplies that weren't on the list" circus that happens every year!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Most complete school package.
customer_reviews.text: The package was complete and full of the school necessities. They pack alot into a small box.
customer_reviews.author: LEBEAU75

customer_reviews.title: Perfect back to school starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I should have bought another one. Perfect for multiple people. Thank you. This is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: kelly bebber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time. Fast delivery. Everything was in the package as it states. I had more supplies then needed but my high schooler has extras, which can be used later in the year. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Christy Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Received exactly what was described!
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice time saver as I needed to get a couple sets of essential school supplies for my 2 high school aged kids. I am sure I will need something for a specific class or 2 but this covered 90-95% of the needs for sure.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Bought for daughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter entering junior year she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.B.B

customer_reviews.title: You do not receive all college ruled
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this. We received a combination of wide rules and college ruled supplies mostly red colored notebooks. I only need college ruled and having everything the same color make it tough to differentiate notebooks in a locker. And quality is not 5 star so I’m sure I’ll be replacing mid year.
customer_reviews.author: Marne S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It has everything my son needed to start high school on the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Zhy’on Scott

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Had everything my son needed to start school and I didn't have to leave the house
customer_reviews.author: candi a rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Go to Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Could have went to Walmart and got better quality stuff for the same price
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wow now that's impressive
customer_reviews.text: I've heard of big things come in small packages, but this was the definition of packing like a tetris masterpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with products
customer_reviews.text: I love the bundles! I have 3 high school students and my bundles I received cut school supply shopping more than half. There are only a few items that I need separately.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Suga

customer_reviews.title: School Supplies
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. It came earlier than expected. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will use this next year as well.
customer_reviews.text: We received everything as expected. Was happy because this package was able to fill both of my boys supply needs.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca norris

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my children. No stores for me this year. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: GOLDQWINGS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff! My sister started 8th grade. This was perfect! Everything she needed.
customer_reviews.author: Madleen

customer_reviews.title: No more stress shopping for supplies lol
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hoping I wouldn't need to deal with going inside a store for school supplies. It was perfect for my high school junior. Thank you for taking all the stress out of buying supplies!
customer_reviews.author: J Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely helpful to have a one stop shop package for school. My child loved it! I just wish it had wide ruled paper in it also.
customer_reviews.author: FireLady07

customer_reviews.title: Help kids in needed.
customer_reviews.text: If i want to buy 50 packs,i will get a discount?
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

product_meta.title: Ultimate High School and College Back to School Essentials Kit - 92 Pieces
product_meta.description: Parents of high school students and college students rejoice! Finally a school supply box with everything you'll need for your first day of class and enough school supplies to get you through the year. This massive school supply bundle contains (2) 1" binders, (4) college ruled notebooks, (2) college ruled 3-subject notebooks, (5) 2 pocket folders with prongs, (2) plastic tab dividers, (2) college ruled composition books, (2) packs of college ruled loose leaf paper, (1) 48pk Papermate #2 mechanical pencils, (2) pink erasers, (1) binder pouch, (2) pks of index cards, (1) 3pk of highlighters, (2) universal dry erase markers, (12) black pens, (4) red pens, (4) blue pens, (8) #2 pencils, (3) 0.7mm lead refill packs, (1) 12pk Crayola colored pencils, (2) Sharpie permanent markers, (2) 100ct sticky notes, (5) pencil top erasers, and (2) Kleenex pocket packs. Forget shopping around for everything on the school supply list this year. This bundle is perfect for your high school freshman, sophomore, junior, senior, or college bound student for their first year of school. Beyond students, the school supply box is a great kit to give to a middle school teacher, high school teacher, tutor, homeschooler, writer, college instructor, or professor who buys supplies all year. Buying in bulk is the most economical way to save money and when it comes to school supplies, is the easiest way to get everything you need without ever having to step foot in a store.
feature_bullets: Parents of high school students and college students rejoice! Finally a school supply box with everything you'll need for your first day of class and enough school supplies to get you through the year.

This massive school supply bundle contains (2) 1" binders, (4) college ruled notebooks, (2) college ruled 3-subject notebooks, (5) 2 pocket folders with prongs, (2) plastic tab dividers, (2) college ruled composition books, (2) packs of college ruled loose leaf paper.

For writing, the bundle has you covered with (1) 48pk Papermate #2 mechanical pencils, (2) pink erasers, (1) binder pouch, (2) pks of index cards, (1) 3pk of highlighters, (2) universal dry erase markers, (12) black pens, (4) red pens, (4) blue pens, (8) #2 pencils, (3) 0.7mm lead refill packs, (1) 12pk Crayola colored pencils, (2) Sharpie permanent markers, (2) 100ct sticky notes, (5) pencil top erasers, and (2) Kleenex pocket packs.

Beyond students, the school supply box is a great kit to give to a middle school teacher, high school teacher, tutor, homeschooler, writer, college instructor, or professor who buys supplies all year.

Forget shopping around for everything on the school supply list this year. This bundle is perfect for your high school freshman, sophomore, junior, senior, or college bound student for their first year of school.
